task: Retrieve product titles and ratings for products with ratings above '4.5' and price less than '40'. Return in the format {product_titles: list[str], ratings: list[number]}.
List the top 3 product with a rating review of 5 that has the most orders and provide their order counts. Return in the format {product_titles: list[str], order_counts: list[number]}
Identify the most expensive product in each category ('Doohickey', 'Gadget', 'Gizmo', 'Widget'). Return in the format {Doohickey: str, Gadget: str, Gizmo: str, Widget: str}
Retrieve the name, category, and price of the product that has been ordered exactly 100 times and has the lowest price. Return in the format {product: str, category: str, price: number}.
Retrieve the account full name and feedback rating associated with Feedback ID '456'. Return in the format {rating: number, full_name: str}.
Identify which quarter of the year 2025 had the highest number of Reviews created and provide the total count. Return in the format {quarter: str, count: number}.
Retrieve the name of the person who has the highest number of orders and the total count of their orders. Return in the format {person_name: str, order_count: number}.
Retrieve the first name, last name, and email of the account with the highest total invoice payment amount. Return in the format {first_name: str, last_name: str, email: str, sum: number}.
List all people's names from state 'IL' who were born in 1990 and have placed at least one order. Return in the format {names: list[str]}.
Calculate the average rating for products in the 'Widget' category. Return in the format {avg_rating: number}.
